title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
Umbral Gem into the altar. This activated a platform that will allow us to travel deeper into the temple. We found an altar in front of a locked door. There are three slots for Umbral Gems. We'll need to find more if we want to enter the temple's Inner Sanctum. We defeated Balthazar, but the relic is still at large. We should search for it. We encountered Balthazar - Ketheric's advisor. He's been tasked with finding a powerful relic. He asked us to clear the path - by any means necessary.
